item.title: Breadcrumbs
item.description: Seems the easiest way to do this is try to get the crumbs in time order and give them a rating. Ratings will be from 1-5 denoted by the number of loaves üçû 20200807 Blazing a Trail in the Digital Payments Space podcast Haven’t listened to it but the crew seem excited: üçûüçûüçûüçû “For this episode of Breaking Banks, we are setting the stage for a new era of banking experiences and capabilities in the digital payments space.

item.title: Bitfinex
item.description: Official announcement In June 2020 OMG Network announced that Bitfinex will integrate Tether (USDt) on the OMG network: ‚ÄúToday, we‚Äôre excited to announce the launch of the OMG Network that supports thousands of transactions per second and reduces transaction costs to a third of Ethereum,‚Äù said Vansa Chatikavanij, CEO at OMG Network. ‚ÄúWe‚Äôre delighted to partner with Bitfinex to address blockchain‚Äôs scalability issues and drive further growth and adoption of open financial services.

item.description: Where to learn and contribute Official OMG network: home site blog documentation site MainNet block explorer TestNet block explorer Demo wallet: Android IOS Vansa interview following mainnet release and rebranding to OMG Network: What is the OMG network: Kasima Proof of work presentation at Messari mainnet 2020: Latest AMA with Vansa & Kasima: Meh, your YouTube search is as good as mine from here.

item.title: Toyota
item.description: Official announcement On the 22nd June 2020 Jun tweeted: Read the official TFS press release here! Toyota Financial Services is the financial arm of #Toyota Group. They help millions of Toyota customers drive the vehicle of their dreams with their flexible financial and lease programs. #SYNQA #Omise #OMGnetworkhttps://t.co/a9ZgdoGi0n — JUNŒû ÊΩ§ (@JUN_SYNQA) June 22, 2020 The press release (Google) translates to (added links are mine): “Investment in SYNQA (formerly Omise Holdings) Toyota Financial Services Co.
